text: Poor service: Staff Nurse Kai and management is lousy. My Dad was not properly cared for during his stay in Pearl's Hill NH. Will not recommend.

Too strict in letting visitors to come on visit in covid19 period. Patients have emotional needs for visitors and very difficult to get good slots to visit during weekends. The head nurse is not flexible enough to allow visitors to take even few minutes visit
My father passed away on 23 April 2022, I have yet to get back my $600 deposit from NH.
Convenient with supermarket, Hawker centres just around the hostel.
